text: Hey guys do you know why When I run my huspot server with hs project dev the server starts and stops immediately

In a workflow you can set up a trigger to enroll records in your workflow and then you can use custom-coded actions which use your private app key by setting up a secret for it.  You can also go to your private app and set up webhooks if you want to do it that way.  All depends on what you want to accomplish.
Thanks Scott!..let me check how to pass the value to my webhook.
Typo in the HubSpot dev extension
